snippet: Johnson edged Kevin Harvick by a half-second on Sunday, and Jeff Gordon and Brad Keselowski were at the center of an altercation in pit row after a bumping episode on the track.
abstract: Auto Racing Roundup; Jimmie Johnson wins AAA Texas 500 auto race as fight erupts between Brad Keselowski and Jeff Gordon; other racing news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and AGENCE FRANCE-PRESSE

lead_paragraph: Johnson edged Kevin Harvick by a half-second on Sunday, and Jeff Gordon and Brad Keselowski were at the center of an altercation in pit row after a bumping episode on the track.

headline.main: Jimmie Johnson Wins in Sprint Cup Chase After a Stormy Finish
headline.print_headline: Johnson Wins in Texas After a Stormy Finish
